div.data-react-data-bundle: {"notifications":[{"id":8103,"message":"Gov. Jared Polis issued an executive order to cancel schools in Colorado for the remainder of this school year. Distance Learning is currently implemented and will stay in place through Thursday, May 21. The following week, May 25-28, will be for submittal of any outstanding assignments and grading (no new assignment issued after May 21).\r\n\r\nCHSAA has announced that the Spring Sports season is canceled.","type":"banner"}]}

a.title: Board of Education Meetings
a.div:
REGULAR BOARD MEETING -
REMOTE OPTION
The next South Routt School District Board of Education meeting will be on Tuesday, May 19 starting at 5:30pm. This meeting will be remote for guests/visitors. The remote access information needed for this meeting will be posted here by 5:00pm on the date of the board meeting.

div.span: REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for District Wide Roof Projects

div.div:
Re-roof and Roof Replacement Soroco HS / South Routt Elementary
South Routt RE-3 School District (Owner) is soliciting qualified bidders interested in replacing roofing on Soroco HS and South Routt Elementary
PROPOSAL DUE DATE/DELIVERY REQUIREMENTS – 2:00 p.m. May 5th, 2020
Mandatory Pre-bid April 24, 1:00 p.m.
Please Request This RFP From:
District’s Roofing Consultant
Division 7 Design, Inc.
d7dgregmcclure@outlook.com
Do not contact school staff download documents from the Districts web page at
www.southroutt.k12.co.us
*Due to Covid-19, please only bring required personnel and be sure to wear the appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)

div.div:
We have a need in South Routt School District to have parents who are interested, to serve on the District Accountability Committee (DAC). This committee meets four times a year (1-2 hr meeting). Their charge is to advise the board of education on the topics of budget priorities, the district improvement plan and other matters relating to accreditation such as school safety.
If you are interested, or you have questions, please make contact with the district office (970.870.3799) or send an email to rwatson@southrouttk12.org. We are looking for parents of current students who will help sharpen us toward accountability for student achievement results.

p.span: South Routt School District RE-3 provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
